import React from 'react' import Card from '../components/card' import FormGroup from '../components/form-group' class CadastroUsuario extends React.Component{ state = { nome: '', email: '', senha: '', senhaRepeticao: '' } cadastrar = () => { } render(){ return(
this.setState({nome: e.target.value})}/> this.setState({email: e.target.value})}/> this.setState({senha: e.target.value})}/> this.setState({senhaRepeticao: e.target.value})}/>
) } } export default CadastroUsuario
